thread.title: We Need To Get Our Hands On Monica Dogra’s Tasseled Lehenga
thread.title_full: We Need To Get Our Hands On Monica Dogra’s Tasseled Lehenga

author: Sanaa Shah
title: We Need To Get Our Hands On Monica Dogra’s Tasseled Lehenga
text:
A post shared by Monica Dogra / Aka Shaa'ir (@monicadogra) on Mar 29, 2017 at 9:24pm PDT 
We recently spotted Monica Dogra in NYC sporting a very indie look for her first performance ever at the Lincoln Centre. For this event, she opted for a crop top and lehenga by Payal Singhal . It was a blue lehenga embellished with gold tassels at regular intervals throughout. With her tresses tamed in soft curls, she finished   lipstick and a bindi to add an Indian touch to her ensemble. 
Also, check out this tasseled choli she did a Boomerang in—
